tool.name: CTAT Genome Reference Library Data Manager
tool.description: Retrieve, and/or Specify the location of, a CTAT Genome Reference Library.
tool.help: Retrieve, and/or specify the location of, a CTAT Genome Reference Library. When download is true, the file retrieved and processed is https://data.broadinstitute.org/Trinity/CTAT_RESOURCE_LIB/GRCh38_gencode_v26_CTAT_lib_Nov012017.plug-n-play.tar.gz. Specify the Full Path of the location where the CTAT Reference Library should be placed. You will need approximately 30GB of space for this library. If you already have the library, specify the full path of the location where it exists and leave the download box unchecked. The Reference Genome name may be left empty if downloading. The name will be used as the selector text of the entry in the data table. For more information on CTAT Genome Reference Libraries, see FusionFilter
